price: Sila namni jechi adabbii isa irratti mirkanaa’e (nama hamtuu irraa fagaate waliin wal qixaa)? Sila ati nama ibidda keessa jiru ni baraartaa?
arabic: أَفَمَنۡ حَقَّ عَلَيۡهِ كَلِمَةُ ٱلۡعَذَابِ أَفَأَنتَ تُنقِذُ مَن فِي ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: afaman ḥaqqa ʿalayhi kalimatu al-ʿadhābi afa-anta tunqidhu man fī al-nāri
